ParticipantRole.name: ParticipantRole
ParticipantRole.description: Represents details such as the name and associated default access level for a role that a participant can have in the context of a parent record.

DefaultAccessLevel.description: The default sharing access granted to the participant role.

DeveloperName.description: The unique name of the object in the API.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether the participant role is activated (true) or not (false).

Language.description: The language of the participant role.

MasterLabel.description: The name for the participant role.

NamespacePrefix.description: Namespace prefix associated with this object.

ParentObject.description: The parent object for the participant role.
